description:
Student Review of Pic Monkey for Beginners course:

Time Well Spent!

"Pic Monkey for Beginners by Erica Wagner was time well spent for me. Iâ€™ve been wanting to learn how to do some of my own graphic design and I had already bought the Royal upgrade with Pic Monkey so this training was perfect for me. Well done Erica". Fred Ferguson

**************************************************************************************************************

There are a lot of people who do graphic design. Some do it for the fun of it. Some do it to make money. Some do it to fix and or enhance photos. Some do it because they love it. The best part is, you can be a graphic designer and not know how to draw. That means a lot more people can be graphics designers and learn it easily.

You see a bunch of modified, enhanced and changed photos on the internet and wonder how they did it. More than likely it was done by graphic design. With graphic design you can create amazing images with ease. Sounds awesome right? Do you want to make modified and enhanced images? Don't know how? That's what I'm here for! I'm going to teach you everything you need to know about graphic design with Pic Monkey.

This course will explain:

  • What Pic Monkey is and used for
  • What different elements you use in graphic design
  • How to fix stretched images
  • How to make wallpaper, covers, banners, profile pictures, ads and thumbnails
  • How to texturize images and more

This course is comprised of video and downloadable documents to help you understand Pic Monkey.

This course will be of great value to anyone who wants to learn the basics of graphic design using Pic Monkey.
title: Pic Monkey for Beginners - Graphic Design and Photo Editing
